posts.title: Huge traffic jam in Logroño Road - Burgos
posts.description: There's a huge traffic jam in Logroño Road, in Burgos, from Mercadona to the Pilgrim roundabout. Try to avoid this road for now.

posts.title: BERLINERS, new music group
posts.description: BERLINERS will give their first concert in Berlin this Saturday at 20.00 in Hossfman Street, 5.

comments.message: Why do I live in Germany?
It's like telling someone to avoid going to the toilet.
I don't really need a new planet thank you, could you discover a way to teleport tho?
